description.title: The description Schema
examples:
Get 15% off on Food & Beverages at Gerard Cafe
1.The offer is valid till 30-09-2022
2.Offer is not valid in conjunction with other offers, discounts and special promotions.
3.Offer is applicable for ADIB card users only
4.Offer is subject to merchant approval
5.Cardholder must mention the offer before making the payment to redeem the offer.
6.Offer cannot be exchanged for cash or any other merchandise.

howToRedeem.title: The howToRedeem Schema
examples:
1. Visit the restaurant
2. Show the offer details to the management
3. Make sure the offer is applied on your bill
4. Make payment using bank card

description.title: The description Schema
examples: Think how jealous you�re friends will be when you tell them you got your uae on AliExpress. With the lowest prices online, cheap shipping rates and local collection options, you can make an even bigger saving.
Enjoy the vast offer of Steam, Origin, Uplay, Battle.net, GOG, PSN and XBOX CD-Keys at the most attractive prices on the market.
Shop online Baby Products, best Stroller, Travel Gear, Feeding, Clothes, Toys, Car Seat, Carrier & Cot on Mumzworld
Jamalon is the largest Arabic store in the Middle East, containing more than 9.5 million Arabic and English books, your book is for your door wherever you are.

description.title: The description Schema
examples:
Get upto 9%  cashback on Aliexpress
1. The offer is valid upto 2023-12-31
2. The offer is valid for Beauty, Fashion, Baby & Kids, TV & Electronics, Mobiles, Tablets & Computers, Home, Kitchen & Garden, Sports, Fitness & Outdoors only
3. The offer is applicable for Mobile, Desktop / Web
4. The offer is valid on all users only
5. The offer is applicable for $BANKNAME$ card users only
6. The offer is applicable at online
7. Approved cashback will be credited in average 90 days of successful purchase.
8. Cashback is applicable only if the customer clicks on the offer communication and transacts using bank's cards.
9. Cashback is subject to merchant approval, returns, refunds, bank approval etc.
10. Customer is redirected to third party website – Terms of third party website will be applicable on the shopping experience.
11. The offer is applicable on select categories/products ONLY

Get upto 4%  cashback on G2a
1. The offer is valid upto 2023-12-31
2. The offer is valid for Gaming & Sweepstakes only
3. The offer is applicable for Mobile, Desktop / Web
4. The offer is valid on all users only
5. The offer is applicable for $BANKNAME$ card users only
6. The offer is applicable at online
7. Approved cashback will be credited in average 90 days of successful purchase.
8. Cashback is applicable only if the customer clicks on the offer communication and transacts using bank's cards.
9. Cashback is subject to merchant approval, returns, refunds, bank approval etc.
10. Customer is redirected to third party website – Terms of third party website will be applicable on the shopping experience.
11. The offer is applicable on select categories/products ONLY

Get exclusive offers on Mumzworld
1. The offer is valid upto 2023-12-31
2. The offer is valid for Baby & Kids, Home, Kitchen & Garden, Coupon Offers only
3. The offer is applicable for Desktop / Web
4. The offer is valid on all users only
5. The offer is applicable for $BANKNAME$ card users only
6. The offer is applicable at online
7. Accidental Loss of coupon shall not be covered 
8. Coupons are not transferable 
9. Coupons cannot be replaced if emails are deleted by the claimant
10.Customer is redirected to third party website – Terms of third party website will be applicable on the shopping experience
11.The offer is applicable on select categories/products ONLY
12.The coupon will be auto applied on the merchant website and only using the offer link the discount will be applied.

Get upto 6%  cashback on Jamalon

3. The offer is applicable for Desktop / Web
4. The offer is valid on all users only

6. The offer is applicable at online
7. Approved cashback will be credited in average 90 days of successful purchase.
8. Cashback is applicable only if the customer clicks on the offer communication and transacts using bank's cards.
9. Cashback is subject to merchant approval, returns, refunds, bank approval etc.
10. Customer is redirected to third party website – Terms of third party website will be applicable on the shopping experience.

howToRedeem.title: The howToRedeem Schema
examples:
1. Click on 'Claim' at the bottom of the Offer Page.
2.Click on 'Redeem Now' to get redirected to the merchant website.
3.All you need to do is shop in the categories that the cashback is eligible for.
4. After completing the transaction, your cashback will be credited to your card on an average 90 days from date of purchase.

1. Click on 'Claim' at the bottom of the Offer Page.
2. Click on 'Redeem Now' to get redirected to the merchant website.
3. Make sure the product you purchase is valid under offer T&C
4. The offer discount will be already applied at the merchant website
5. Make the payment using the valid bank card
